title: creating gold+ ranked 5's team.
body:
I myself am currently gold 2. and I can play every role to gold standard. I'd like players that want to play ranked 5's often as I am on often and would like the same.

Must be atleast gold 4(weeding out the 5 boosted people) 
must be active
must have Skype for communication.

add ingame or post if interested

replies.body:
Here is a link to my post to see if you are interested:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/smxWnEHv-gold-1-junglertopmid-lft
I posted the requirements, you didn't meet them. I was nice about it. not my problem man, have a good day
You don't deserve a supportive team of any nature if thats your view on acceptance.

Anyone who tries to sign up to this guy is an idiot I tried to and he instantly declined me just because I'm in Gold 5 didn't bother to see how I actually played just disregarded me completely. This is the kind of person who doesn't deserve a good team.
I could be the top if youre looking for one, if not, gl with the team :p
